column2: Magnetic tornadoes are plasma structures rotating in the atmosphere of the Sun.

column2: There is only one instrument left to complete EST& the ADAPTIVE OPTICS! It will allow us to correct the disturbances in the images of the Sun caused by the atmosphere.
column3: There is only one instrument left to complete EST& the ADAPTIVE OPTICS! It will allow us to correct the disturbances in the images of the Sun caused by the atmosphere.
column4: There is only one instrument left to complete EST& the ADAPTIVE OPTICS! It will allow us to correct the disturbances in the images of the Sun caused by the atmosphere.

column2: Your mission is to enter the Swedish Solar Tower and bring the Adaptive Optics to EST. We rely on you!
column3: Your mission is to enter the Swedish Solar Tower and bring the Adaptive Optics to EST. We rely on you!
column4: Your mission is to enter the Swedish Solar Tower and bring the Adaptive Optics to EST. We rely on you!

column2: Really? But& I had an appointment with some colleagues for... studying.
column3: Really? But& I had an appointment with some colleagues for... studying.
column4: Really? But& I had an appointment with some colleagues for... studying.

column2: Good& that's my girl. So& you better hurry up!
column3: Good& that's my girl. So& you better hurry up!
column4: Good& that's my girl. So& you better hurry up!

column2: The atmospheric turbulences don't let us distinguish those microwaves clearly. We see them moving as if they were dancing Macarena.
column3: The atmospheric turbulences don't let us distinguish those microwaves clearly. We see them moving as if they were dancing Macarena.
column4: The atmospheric turbulences don't let us distinguish those microwaves clearly. We see them moving as if they were dancing Macarena.

column2: Don't waste your time with them& Eclipse. Only Adaptive Optics can correct the distortion. We'll have time to party later!
column3: Don't waste your time with them& Eclipse. Only Adaptive Optics can correct the distortion. We'll have time to party later!
column4: Don't waste your time with them& Eclipse. Only Adaptive Optics can correct the distortion. We'll have time to party later!

column2: Alarm! Things are getting hot there! The robots have sabotaged the vacuum and refrigeration systems of the tower.
column3: Alarm! Things are getting hot there! The robots have sabotaged the vacuum and refrigeration systems of the tower.
column4: Alarm! Things are getting hot there! The robots have sabotaged the vacuum and refrigeration systems of the tower.

column2: That systems avoid the accumulation of heating proceeding from the Sun. You'll have to restore it before all the instrumentation gets roasted!
column3: That systems avoid the accumulation of heating proceeding from the Sun. You'll have to restore it before all the instrumentation gets roasted!
column4: That systems avoid the accumulation of heating proceeding from the Sun. You'll have to restore it before all the instrumentation gets roasted!

column2: Good job& Eclipse! SST is working again!
column3: Good job& Eclipse! SST is working again!
column4: Good job& Eclipse! SST is working again!

column2: Oh& I nearly forgot! You were a full expert on how Adaptive Optics works& weren't you? I'm finding it too hard to install all the components in EST.
column3: Oh& I nearly forgot! You were a full expert on how Adaptive Optics works& weren't you? I'm finding it too hard to install all the components in EST.
column4: Oh& I nearly forgot! You were a full expert on how Adaptive Optics works& weren't you? I'm finding it too hard to install all the components in EST.

column2: So& remember also to bring an instructions manual or some guidance!
column3: So& remember also to bring an instructions manual or some guidance!
column4: So& remember also to bring an instructions manual or some guidance!

column2: Sure& Spectro!
column3: Sure& Spectro!
column4: Sure& Spectro!

column2: Heavens! I don't even remember what Adaptive Optics do! (Too many nights “studying” at ORM residence).
column3: Heavens! I don't even remember what Adaptive Optics do! (Too many nights “studying” at ORM residence).
column4: Heavens! I don't even remember what Adaptive Optics do! (Too many nights “studying” at ORM residence).

column2: I'll ask Ms. Prominence for help before Spectro withdraws my allowance!
column3: I'll ask Ms. Prominence for help before Spectro withdraws my allowance!
column4: I'll ask Ms. Prominence for help before Spectro withdraws my allowance!

column2: Bonjour Cherie! Are you having a good time at ORM Residence? What can I do for you?
column3: Bonjour Cherie! Are you having a good time at ORM Residence? What can I do for you?
column4: Bonjour Cherie! Are you having a good time at ORM Residence? What can I do for you?

column2: Yes! A lot of fun. Maybe too much... I don't remember how Adaptive Optics work. I'm sure you will have accurate documentation in Pic du Midi archives.
column3: Yes! A lot of fun. Maybe too much... I don't remember how Adaptive Optics work. I'm sure you will have accurate documentation in Pic du Midi archives.
column4: Yes! A lot of fun. Maybe too much... I don't remember how Adaptive Optics work. I'm sure you will have accurate documentation in Pic du Midi archives.

column2: Could you help me? Next Saturday night there is a... conference& and I don't want Spectro to forbid me to go.
column3: Could you help me? Next Saturday night there is a... conference& and I don't want Spectro to forbid me to go.
column4: Could you help me? Next Saturday night there is a... conference& and I don't want Spectro to forbid me to go.

column2: Of course& Cherie. I'll see what I can find.
column3: Of course& Cherie. I'll see what I can find.
column4: Of course& Cherie. I'll see what I can find.

column2: I found the documents in the archive! There you are! Enjoy your “conference” on Saturday& my friend.
column3: I found the documents in the archive! There you are! Enjoy your “conference” on Saturday& my friend.
column4: I found the documents in the archive! There you are! Enjoy your “conference” on Saturday& my friend.

column2: Yeah! Thanks! You rock& Ms. Prominence!
column3: Yeah! Thanks! You rock& Ms. Prominence!
column4: Yeah! Thanks! You rock& Ms. Prominence!

column2: Bad news again& Eclipse! The robots have torn the Adaptive Optics to pieces. We have seen them wandering around ORM outdoors! You'll have to recover all the parts!
column3: Bad news again& Eclipse! The robots have torn the Adaptive Optics to pieces. We have seen them wandering around ORM outdoors! You'll have to recover all the parts!
column4: Bad news again& Eclipse! The robots have torn the Adaptive Optics to pieces. We have seen them wandering around ORM outdoors! You'll have to recover all the parts!

column2: I'm afraid that solar activity is increasing& and things are getting worse! You'll need extra help.
column3: I'm afraid that solar activity is increasing& and things are getting worse! You'll need extra help.
column4: I'm afraid that solar activity is increasing& and things are getting worse! You'll need extra help.

column2: We have a surprise for you& so please go to the observing room to get it!
column3: We have a surprise for you& so please go to the observing room to get it!
column4: We have a surprise for you& so please go to the observing room to get it!

column2: This device pools small solar magnetic fields& creating a shield that repels the enemies' attacks. It was supposed to be your graduation gift. But well& go outside and beat them!
column3: This device pools small solar magnetic fields& creating a shield that repels the enemies' attacks. It was supposed to be your graduation gift. But well& go outside and beat them!
column4: This device pools small solar magnetic fields& creating a shield that repels the enemies' attacks. It was supposed to be your graduation gift. But well& go outside and beat them!

column2: On my way!
column3: On my way!
column4: On my way!

column2: Congratulations! You have all the pieces! But maybe the AO has been damaged. Please run a test on SST!
column3: Congratulations! You have all the pieces! But maybe the AO has been damaged. Please run a test on SST!
column4: Congratulations! You have all the pieces! But maybe the AO has been damaged. Please run a test on SST!

column2: Incredible performance& Eclipse! Full marks!
column3: Incredible performance& Eclipse! Full marks!
column4: Incredible performance& Eclipse! Full marks!
